children.name: title
keywords: The Three Pillars for Automatic Relations

children.name: Thm. (M. ‘24) Every relation has a syntactic sync. algebra. A relation is automatic iff this algebra is finite.
keywords: Thm. (M. ‘24) Every relation has a syntactic sync. algebra. A relation is automatic iff this algebra is finite.

children.name: Thm. (M. ‘24) Pseudovarieties of auto. relations are in correspondence w/ pseudovarieties of sync. algebras.

children.name: Thm. (M. ‘24) Pseudovarieties of sync. algebras are exactly those described by profinite dependencies.
